function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of multi-scale detection techniques may increase computational resource requirements","Impact":"Increased demand on computational resources may slow down processing speed and increase energy consumption","Mitigation":"Optimize algorithms and use efficient hardware for computation to reduce resource requirements","Technologies":"Efficient hardware such as GPUs, algorithm optimization techniques","People":"Developers, system administrators, users with limited computational resources","Owner":"Developers, system administrators, technology providers"},{"Description":"Inefficient spatial pooling operations may impact the accuracy and efficiency of the model","Impact":"Reduced accuracy and efficiency of object detection and classification","Mitigation":"Use of alternative pooling operations, optimization of pooling parameters, and rigorous testing","Technologies":"Different pooling operations, parameter optimization techniques, testing frameworks","People":"Data scientists, machine learning engineers, developers","Owner":"Data science team, machine learning team"},{"Description":"Use of selective search and region proposal for two-stage detectors may introduce potential biases in object detection","Impact":"Biased object proposal selection may lead to inaccurate detection and classification of objects","Mitigation":"Use of diverse training data, rigorous evaluation of model performance, and consideration of alternative detection methods","Technologies":"Data augmentation, evaluation metrics, alternative detection algorithms","People":"Data scientists, machine learning engineers, researchers","Owner":"Data science team, research team"}]}
